Update 1.1:

The Fish update!

Major changes:

- Added anchovies

- Mobile support!

Other:

- Removed the "Exit game" button from WebGL builds

- Peace and quiet after you lose the game :)

Update 1.1.2:

- Changed the anchovies spawn logic to negate the floating point error problem

(as a result, the level now starts a fraction of a second later)
